name: copyConfig
shortDescription: Copies configuration parameters from one channel to another
description: This method copies configuration data (the MASTER parameter set) from one channel to another. If a parameter doesn't exist in the target parameter set, it is ignored.
signatures: Void copyConfig(Integer sourcePeerId, Integer sourceChannel, Integer targetPeerId, Integer targetChannel)

parameters.name: sourcePeerId
parameters.description: The id of the peer to copy the parameter set from

parameters.name: sourceChannel
parameters.description: The channel to copy the parameter set from

parameters.name: targetPeerId
parameters.description: The id of the peer to copy the parameter set to

parameters.name: targetChannel
parameters.description: The channel to copy the parameter set to

parameters.name: sourceAddress
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the device to copy the parameter set from (separated by colon)

parameters.name: targetAddress
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the device to copy the parameter set to (separated by colon)

errors.description: At least one of the parameter sets is unknown.
